author: Joseph Pollino
title: What it's like for first responders like me to get told coronavirus is a 'hoax'
description: As long as regular Americans are openly rejecting the advice of doctors, our problem is going to get much worse before it gets better.
content: Only a few short months ago, which now seems like a lifetime, I was standing on a stage speaking on behalf of my graduating class of new physician assistants thanking our families for their support, and wishing my new colleagues well. After a decade of workin… [+5104 chars]
